name: iancamp.github.io
description: A fun, colorful, single-page site built with plain HTML/CSS/JS â€” ready for GitHub Pages.

scripts.copy:essential-files: mkdir -p dist/assets/photos/full dist/assets/photos/thumbs dist/menu && cp *.html *.css *.js dist/ && cp -r menu/. dist/menu/ && cp assets/photos/*.json dist/assets/photos/
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy:essential-files && npm run generate:photos
